name: Ten Seconds Again
description:
You can try it on mobile web browser too! Just tap!

A game made in 2022 for Ludum Dare 51 by Edwin

Tools

  • Game Engine & GFX: Construct 3
  • Music and SFX: Reaper, Nintendo VST 1.2, airwindows vsts

Controls

  • Tap to blast.
  • Hold for auto attack.
Hints
  • Overlapping enemies might cause chain reactions.
  • Angy faces when countdown hits 1 incur score penalty.
  • Hit the zapper to zap.
  • Tap L Count to advance level.
  • Tap Countdown to skip a second.
  • Tap Coin Count to eradicate one angy face per coin.
  • Coin count modifies point value.
  • Countdown modifies point value.
